text:
Error-messages from cgi-scripts are logged into the ErrorLog of the main server
instead in the ErrorLog of the virtual host. Logging of HTTP-Errors (i.e. 404)
_does_ get into the right place.
creator: rob@net-pr.de
rob@net-pr.de
text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> You are using mod_cgid, correct?
> 

Yupp.
I also tried out the ScriptLog directive, but then no script worked at all.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 14090 ***
creator: trawick@apache.org
